title: Ownership of land so handed over shall be transferred in the name of MCGM in land revenue records
clause_text: Ownership of land so handed over shall be transferred in the name of MCGM in land revenue records. The cost of any transaction involved shall be borne by the owner or lessee

source_pdf.text_snippet: Ownership of land so handed over shall be transferred in the name of MCGM in land revenue records. The cost of any transaction involved shall be borne by the owner or lessee
